comments.content: [ITC Cheltenham](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012040720/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-cheltenham/) book and ultra to be exact...
Thank you both very much. Noch einen schönen Sonntag!
I reckon it’s Bold rather than Ultra.
